document.full_text: ms. taylor was an actress who was best known as the endearing grandmother on 'the cosby show' and who also won an obie award for her portrayal of moms mabley.
document.title: clarice taylor dies at 93; tv's cosby called her mom
lines_and_colors: ms. taylor was an actress who was best known as the endearing grandmother on 'the cosby show' and who also won an obie award for her portrayal of moms mabley.
